name: Mini Tank: Targets
description:
Mini Tank: Targets is an endless arcade shooter with a chaotic twist, any bullet you fire will bounce around the small map 10 times before stopping.

Each time a target is hit another one will spawn. Gradually the number of targets that spawn will increase.

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move and use the mouse to Aim and Shoot. You can pause the game with "F" and restart the game with "R".

This game was created within a week for the Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam, which had "Let There Be Chaos" as its theme.

Music - Jonathan So - https://jonathan-so.itch.io/creatorpack 

Font -  Vladimir Nikolic - https://www.dafont.com/ausweis.font
